title: Build current app state (dummy OTP auto-verify and direct dashboard access)
constraints: Keep all user-facing text in English.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add backend/migration.mo if state migration is required.
nonGoals: Do not add new product features beyond what is already implemented (this request is a build trigger only).
Do not change authentication design from the current dummy-OTP flow unless explicitly requested.
